title: UNABLE TO GET INTO QUICK SETTINGS WHEN IN FULL SCREEN( GAMES, YOUTUBE VIDEO)‚Åø
content:
I am facing a weird issue where i am not able to get to quick settings when pulling down the status bar in full screen applications like YouTube video and while playing games. this issue has started after i got a recent update of 24mb. 
Current build no:QP1A.190711.020.C3
